reason: Relapse after a period of sobriety indicates a vulnerability and increased risk, although the individual is actively seeking help and trying to manage the situation. The disappointment could escalate if not addressed.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD last night. Scary stuff. Narcan worked, thank goodness. Please, learn the signs and carry it if you can. Could save a life.
reason: While the person survived, an overdose is a serious medical emergency with potentially fatal consequences. The message encourages preparedness, implying a risk of future incidents.

title: User Story: Suicide
content: Been feeling so lost lately. Everything feels heavy. Reaching out because I don't know what else to do. If you've been there, any advice?
reason: The text expresses feelings of being lost and overwhelmed, suggesting potential distress and a need for support. While there's no explicit mention of self-harm or suicidal ideation, the phrase "I don't know what else to do" indicates a possible escalation of negative emotions.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD at the park today. Scariest thing ever. Narcan saved their life. Seriously, please learn how to use it. It's not hard and it can save someone you love.
reason: The text describes an overdose event, which is a life-threatening situation requiring immediate intervention.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Just found my neighbor unresponsive. Narcan worked. Terrifying. Please, if you're struggling, reach out. There are people who care. Don't let it get to this point. ❤️
reason: The text describes a neighbor found unresponsive and requiring Narcan, indicating a life-threatening overdose event that could have been fatal.

title: User Story: Self-Harm

reason: The text indicates a relapse of urges and feelings of isolation, which are risk factors for self-harm or suicide. While there is no explicit mention of intent or plan, the stated difficulty in staying strong warrants concern.

title: User Story: Self-Harm

reason: The text indicates a relapse and a desire to "stay safe," suggesting potential risk, though the specific nature and immediacy are unclear. The feeling of loneliness also elevates the risk.

title: User Story: Violence

reason: The text describes feeling "shaky" due to witnessing a fight, triggering past trauma. While concerning, it doesn't indicate immediate danger to self or others. The individual is actively seeking resources for dealing with trauma, which is a positive coping mechanism.
